Module it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.game

Class Match

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.game.Match
public class Match extends Object
Represents a match in the game.

    • Match

      public Match(int lobbyId)
      Constructs a new Match object.

  • Method Details

    • load

      public void load(List<Controller> controllers) throws IOException
      Loads the match with the provided controllers and initializes game state.
      Parameters:
      controllers - List of controllers associated with players in the match.
      Throws:
      IOException - If there's an error in loading game state.

    • resumeGame

      public void resumeGame() throws InterruptedException
      Resumes the game from a paused state, updating players and clients with current game state.
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - If thread is interrupted while waiting.

    • takeSeat

      public void takeSeat(Controller controller) throws MatchExceptions
      Allows a player to take a seat in the match.
      Parameters:
      controller - The controller associated with the player taking the seat.
      Throws:
      MatchExceptions - If the match is already full or if the match is already started.

    • leaveSeat

      public void leaveSeat(Controller controller) throws MatchExceptions
      Allows a player to leave their seat in the match.
      Parameters:
      controller - The player leaving the match.
      Throws:
      MatchExceptions - If the match has already started or if the player is not found.

    • chooseStarterCardSide

      public void chooseStarterCardSide(Player p, boolean side) throws PlayerExceptions
      Allows a player to choose the side of the starter card.
      Parameters:
      p - The player making the choice.
      side - The chosen side of the starter card.
      Throws:
      PlayerExceptions - If it's not the time to choose or if the card side has already been chosen

    • chooseObjective

      public void chooseObjective(Player p, int num) throws PlayerExceptions
      Allows a player to choose an objective.
      Parameters:
      p - The player making the choice.
      num - The index of the chosen objective.
      Throws:
      PlayerExceptions - If it's not the time to choose or if the objective has already been chosen.

    • startMatch

      public void startMatch() throws JsonLoadException, InterruptedException, MatchExceptions
      Starts the match.
      Throws:
      MatchExceptions - If the match has already started or if the number of players is invalid.
      InterruptedException - if a thread is interrupted while waiting
      JsonLoadException - If there is an error loading JSON data.

    • getPlayers

      public ArrayList<Player> getPlayers()
      Gets the list of players in the match.
      Returns:
      The list of players.

    • getScoreTrack

      public ScoreTrack getScoreTrack()
      Gets the score track of the match.
      Returns:
      The score track.

    • getStartingPlayer

      public Player getStartingPlayer()
      Gets the starting player of the match.
      Returns:
      The starting player.

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public Player getCurrentPlayer()
      Gets the current player in the match.
      Returns:
      The current player.

    • getTopGoldKingdom

      public Symbol getTopGoldKingdom() throws PlayerExceptions
      Gets the symbol of the top gold card in the gold deck.
      Returns:
      The symbol of the top gold card.
      Throws:
      PlayerExceptions - If the gold deck is empty.

    • getTopResourceKingdom

      public Symbol getTopResourceKingdom() throws PlayerExceptions
      Gets the symbol of the top resource card in the resource deck.
      Returns:
      The symbol of the top resource card.
      Throws:
      PlayerExceptions - If the resource deck is empty.

    • drawGold

      public PlayableCard drawGold() throws PlayerExceptions
      Draws a gold card from the gold deck.
      Returns:
      The drawn gold card.
      Throws:
      PlayerExceptions - If the gold deck is empty.

    • drawResource

      public PlayableCard drawResource() throws PlayerExceptions
      Draws a resource card from the resource deck.
      Returns:
      The drawn resource card.
      Throws:
      PlayerExceptions - If the resource deck is empty.

    • drawMarket

      public PlayableCard drawMarket(int index) throws ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException, PlayerExceptions
      Draws a card from the market at the specified index.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the card to draw from the market.
      Returns:
      The drawn card.
      Throws:
      ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - If the index is out of bounds.
      PlayerExceptions - If the specified index does not contain a card.

    • updateScoreTrack

      public void updateScoreTrack(int score)
      Updates the score track with the given score for the current player.
      Parameters:
      score - The score to be added to the score track.

    • endConditionMet

      public boolean endConditionMet()
      Checks if the end condition of the match is met.
      Returns:
      True if the end condition is met, otherwise false.

    • nextTurn

      public void nextTurn()
      Advances the game to the next turn.

    • getNextPlayer

      public Player getNextPlayer()
      Gets the player who plays next.
      Returns:
      The player who plays next.

    • getObjectives

      public Objective[] getObjectives()
      Retrieves the common objectives for the match.
      Returns:
      An array containing the common objectives.

    • getMarket

      public PlayableCard[] getMarket()
      Retrieves the current market of the match.
      Returns:
      An array containing the cards in the market.

    • endMatch

      public void endMatch()
      Ends the match and determines the winner(s).

    • lastRound

      public boolean lastRound()
      Checks if it's the last round of the match.
      Returns:
      True if it's the last round, otherwise False.

    • isStarted

      public boolean isStarted()
      Checks if the match has started.
      Returns:
      True if the match has started, otherwise false.

    • broadcast

      public void broadcast(Message m)
      Broadcasts a message to all players in the match.
      Parameters:
      m - The message to broadcast.

    • broadcast

      public void broadcast(Message m, Player exclude)
      Sends a message to all players, excluding a specific player.
      Parameters:
      m - the message to send
      exclude - the player to exclude from receiving the message

    • endForDisconnection

      public void endForDisconnection()
      Ends the match due to player disconnection, handling cleanup and notifying clients.
